Trade/Device Name(s): Piccolo Basic Metabolic Panel Plus Reagent Disc
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Piccolo Lactate Dehydrogenase Test System for quantitative analysis of lactate dehydrogenase on Piccolo Point-of-Care Chemistry Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of lactate dehydrogenase activity in heparinized plasma or serum to aid in diagnosis and treatment of liver diseases, cardiac diseases, and tissue alterations of the heart, kidney, liver, and muscle
